players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I have proof that Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately to protect the town."
You: "Diana, what proof do you have? Accusing someone without evidence could get an innocent person killed."
Charlie: "Diana, what exactly is your proof against Bob? We need more details to make a fair decision."
Diana: "I already investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is the mafioso. If we don't vote him out now, he could kill one of us tonight."
You: "Diana, your 'proof' is vague and could be a mafia ploy to eliminate me. We should vote for you if you can't provide more details."
Charlie: "Diana, your investigation claim is our best lead, so I think we should vote for Bob to protect the town."
